eng:
No skill.

This armament has no skill.
If the armament in the other hand has a skill, that skill will be used instead.
chn:
战技：无战技

武器没有战技。
如果另一边的武器具备战技，
会使用那一边的战技。

eng:
Skill: Lion's Claw

Skill of the Redmanes, who fought alongside General Radahn.
Somersault forwards, striking foes with armament.
chn:
战技：狮子斩

与拉塔恩将军并肩作战的
红狮子军队所使用的战技。
能朝前方跳跃，一边旋身一边以武器敲击。

eng:
Skill: Impaling Thrust

Skill that lets piercing armaments overcome enemy shields. Build power, then lunge forward for a strong thrust that pierces an enemy's guard.
chn:
战技：贯穿

突刺武器对付持盾敌人时的战技。
蓄力之后，大幅度向前跨出
使出浑身一刺，从正面突破防御。

eng:
Skill: Piercing Fang

Skill used by Yura, the Bloody Finger Hunter.
Starting with the blade held horizontally, make a powerful thrust that cannot be blocked.
chn:
战技：突刺

“血指猎人”尤拉的战技。
举起武器与地面平行，再一口气贯穿敌人。
此战技无法用防御挡下。

eng:
Skill: Spinning Slash

Skill favored by dexterous warriors.
Slash foes as your body spins. Additional input allows for a follow-up attack.
chn:
战技：回旋斩

拥有高灵巧的剑士们使用的战技。
能大幅旋转身体，砍向敌人。
再次发动能使出追击。

eng:
Skill: Charge Forth

Quickly charge forward with the armament at the hip, carrying the momentum into a thrust.
Hold to cover a greater distance.
chn:
战技：突击

武器及腰摆出架式，再一口气向前冲的战技。
前进到极限后能使出突刺攻击。
持续发动能增加移动距离。

eng:
Skill: Stamp (Upward Cut)

Brace armament and step into a low stance that prevents recoil from most enemy attacks.
Follow up with a strong attack for an upward strike.
chn:
战技：箭步（上砍）

举起武器摆出架式，稳住姿势压低身形，
瞬间提升强韧度的战技。
发动后接着使出重攻击，能上砍攻击。

eng:
Skill: Stamp (Sweep)

Brace armament and step into a low stance that prevents recoil from most enemy attacks.
Follow up with a strong attack for a sweeping strike.
chn:
战技：箭步（回旋斩）

举起武器摆出架式，稳住姿势压低身形，
瞬间提升强韧度的战技。
发动后接着使出重攻击，能回旋斩。

eng:
Skill: Blood Tax

Blood Oath skill granted by the Lord of Blood.
Twist to build power, then unleash a flurry of thrusts that rob the target of both their blood and their HP.
chn:
战技：鲜血征收

鲜血君王分享的力量，血盟战技之一。
旋身之后，使出多重的突刺连击。
能夺取受攻击对象的鲜血与血量。

eng:
Skill: Repeating Thrust

Twist to build power, then unleash a flurry of thrusts.
chn:
战技：连击

旋身之后，使出连续突刺的战技。

eng:
Skill: Wild Strikes

Swing armament with wild abandon.
Hold to continue swinging. Can be followed up with a normal or strong attack.
chn:
战技：盲击

不间断、任意挥动武器的战技。
持续发动的期间能一直攻击，
接着使出轻攻击或重攻击，能追加攻击。

eng:
Skill: Spinning Strikes

Polearm skill that performs continuous spinning attacks. Hold to continue the attack. Can be followed up with a normal or strong attack. Nullifies projectiles such as arrows while spinning.
chn:
战技：回旋击

大幅度旋转长柄武器的战技。
持续发动的期间能一直攻击，
接着使出轻攻击或重攻击，能追加攻击。
旋转武器时，能拨开箭等等的远攻道具。

eng:
Skill: Double Slash

Skill of superior swordsmen.
Perform a crossing slash attack from a low stance.
Repeated inputs allow for up to two follow-up attacks.
chn:
战技：二连斩

杰出剑士的战技。
压低身形后，使出连续的交错斩击。
再次发动能使出最多两次的追击。

eng:
Skill: Prelate's Charge

Slam armament into the ground to create a surge of flames, then charge in.
Hold to continue the charge.
chn:
战技：主教冲锋

将武器敲向地面，形成猛烈燃烧的火焰，
再顺势向前推进的战技。
持续发动的期间能一直向前推进。

eng:
Skill: Unsheathe

Skill of swordsmen from the Land of Reeds.
Sheathe blade, holding it at the hip in a composed stance.
Follow up with a normal or strong attack to perform a swift slash attack.
chn:
战技：居合

芦苇之地的剑客继承而来的战技。
收刀入腰间刀鞘，摆出架式后静止不动，
接着使出轻攻击或重攻击，能高速斩击。

eng:
Skill: Square Off

This skill starts with the sword held level.
Follow up with a normal attack to slash upwards through enemy's guard, or a strong attack to perform a running thrust.
chn:
战技：准备架式

举起剑与地面平行，接着使出攻击的战技。
轻攻击能使出由下而上，突破防御的斩击。
重攻击能向前冲刺、突刺攻击。

eng:
Skill: Giant Hunt

Skill developed for confronting gigantic foes.
Step forward from a low stance, carrying the momentum into a sudden upward thrust.
chn:
战技：狩猎巨人

挑战体型比自己大的敌人而有的战技。
压低身形稳住姿势，向前踏出，
接着顺势由下而上突刺敌人。

eng:
Skill: Torch Attack

Thrust torch forward to set foes ablaze.
This skill is especially effective against foes who are weak to fire.
chn:
战技：火把攻击

将火把的火焰往前突刺，燃烧敌人的战技。
对不耐火的敌人很有效。

eng:
Skill: Loretta's Slash

Skill of Loretta the Royal Knight.
Leap forward, imbuing the blade with glintstone, then descend, accelerating into a sweeping slash.
chn:
战技：罗蕾塔的斩击

禁卫骑士罗蕾塔的战技。
向前跳的同时，将辉石的魔力灌入剑身，
再加快速度瞬间斩下。

eng:
Skill: Poison Moth Flight

Slash with a poison-infused blade.
If the follow-up strike lands on a poisoned foe, it will deal significant damage.
chn:
战技：双吻毒蛾

在剑刃涂上强效毒，砍向敌人的战技。
对上陷入中毒状态的敌人，
如果成功使出追击，能一口气给予大伤害。

eng:
Skill: Spinning Weapon

Defensive skill employed by Carian princesses.
Lifts armament into mid-air, then makes it spin violently. Those it touches will suffer successive attacks.
chn:
战技：转啊转

卡利亚公主们防身用的战技。
将武器浮在自身前方高速旋转，
触碰到的人物会受到连击。

eng:
Skill: Storm Assault

One of the skills that channel the tempests of Stormveil.
Leap forward through surrounding storm winds and thrust armament downward. The attack will produce more storm winds at the point of impact.
chn:
战技：风暴袭击

史东薇尔的风暴战技之一。
缠绕着风暴向前跳，将武器向下刺。
突刺攻击后也会形成风暴。

eng:
Skill: Stormcaller

One of the skills that channel the tempests of Stormveil. Spin armament to create surrounding storm winds. Repeated inputs allow for up to two follow-up attacks.
chn:
战技：唤起风暴

史东薇尔的风暴战技之一。
能挥舞武器，在自身周围唤起风暴。
再次发动能使出最多两次的追击。

eng:
Skill: Sword Dance

Quickly close in to perform a series of spinning upward slashes.
Follow up with an additional input to finish with a downward slash.
chn:
战技：剑舞

一边迅速向前推进，
一边使出连续旋身上砍的战技。
再次发动能使出迅速下砍。

eng:
Skill: Spinning Chain

Spins the striking part of a flail at high speed to attack.
Follow up with a normal or strong attack to link the momentum of this skill into a successive attack.
chn:
战技：回旋锁链

高速旋转连枷打击部位的战技。
发动后使出轻攻击或重攻击，能顺势追击。

eng:
Skill: Glintblade Phalanx

Skill used by the enchanted knights who served the Carian royal family. Form an arch of magic glintblades overhead, which will attack foes automatically. Follow up with a strong attack to chain this skill into a lunging thrust.
chn:
战技：辉剑圆阵

侍奉卡利亚王室的魔法骑士们使用的战技。
让魔力辉剑浮空围成半圆，自动攻击敌人。
发动后接着使出重攻击，
能向前大幅跨出、突刺攻击。

eng:
Skill: Sacred Blade

Grants armament's attacks holy essence and fires off a golden blade projectile.
The armament retains its holy essence for a while.
chn:
战技：神圣刀刃

让武器附加圣属性攻击力，
并且顺势释放黄金刀刃的战技。
附加圣属性攻击力的效果会暂时延续。

eng:
Skill: Ice Spear

Skill of the warriors who served Lunar Princess Ranni.
Spin armament to release cold magic, then channel it into a piercing spear of ice.
chn:
战技：冰枪

侍奉“月之公主”菈妮的战士使用的战技。
旋转武器之余唤出寒气，
再顺势使出突刺，释放冰枪。

eng:
Skill: Glintstone Pebble

Skill that employs the glintstone sorcery of the same name.
Follow up with a strong attack to chain this skill into a lunging thrust, performed while the armament is still imbued with glintstone.
chn:
战技：辉石魔砾

能施展同名辉石魔法的战技。
发动后接着使出重攻击，能大幅向前跨出，
使出含有辉石魔力的突刺攻击。

eng:
Skill: Bloody Slash

Blood Oath skill granted by the Lord of Blood.
From a low stance, coat the blade in your own blood to unleash a rending blood slash in a wide arc.
chn:
战技：鲜血斩击

鲜血君王分享的力量，血盟战技之一。
压低身形，将自身的血液布满剑身，
使出大范围撕裂敌人的血刃。

eng:
Skill: Lifesteal Fist

Skill that demonstrates mastery of the art of controlling vital energies.
A slow, controlled punch with an energy-infused fist that renders foes unconscious and steals their HP. Only effective against foes of human build.
chn:
战技：夺命拳

精通气的专家使用的战技。
只对有着人类之身的敌人有效。
将气缓慢缠绕拳头之后再出拳，
能让碰触的人昏倒，夺取血量。

eng:
Skill: Eruption

Skill of the knights who serve at Volcano Manor.
Slam armament into the ground, spawning roiling lava which spouts up upon release.
chn:
战技：熔岩火浆

侍奉火山官邸的骑士们使用的战技。
将武器敲向地面，形成滚烫熔岩，
在拔起武器的同时，熔岩随之喷出。

eng:
Skill: Prayerful Strike

Raise armament aloft in prayer, then slam it into the ground.
This inspired blow restores HP to the self and nearby allies if it successfully hits.
chn:
战技：祈祷一击

伴随祈祷高举武器，再敲向地面的战技。
当那一记诚挚的攻击命中敌人，
能恢复包含周围我方人物的血量。

eng:
Skill: Gravitas

Skill originating from the Alabaster Lords, who had skin of stone.
Thrust the armament into the ground to create a gravity well.
In addition to dealing damage, this attack pulls enemies in.
chn:
战技：重力

源自拥有石质皮肤的白王的战技。
将武器刺入地面，产生重力波，
能给予敌人伤害，同时将对方拉近自己。

eng:
Skill: Storm Blade

Lost skill of Stormveil.
Surround armament with shearing storm winds that can be fired forward.
Can be fired in rapid succession.
chn:
战技：风暴刃

史东薇尔的失传战技。
将武器缠绕风暴刃，朝前方释放风暴。
可以连续施放。

eng:
Skill: Earthshaker

Thrust armament into the ground, then gather strength to unleash an earth-shaking shockwave.
Follow up with a strong attack to swing the armament in a sweeping strike.
chn:
战技：撼地

将武器刺入地面后，再向下使力
产生冲击波，引发剧烈摇晃的战技。
发动后接着使出重攻击，
能回旋横扫攻击。

eng:
Skill: Golden Land

Thrust armament into the ground, then gather strength to unleash a blast of sacred energy that coalesces into golden darts. Follow up with a strong attack to swing the armament in a sweeping strike.
chn:
战技：黄金大地

将武器刺入地面后，再向下使力
引发神圣爆炸，形成黄金石砾的战技。
发动后接着使出重攻击，
能回旋横扫攻击。

eng:
Skill: Flaming Strike

Skill that emits flame in a wide frontward arc.
Follow up with a strong attack to perform a lunging, sweeping strike.
This will also coat the armament in fire.
chn:
战技：炎击

朝前方大范围释放火焰的战技。
发动后接着使出重攻击，
能向前跨出、横扫攻击，并让武器缠绕火焰。

eng:
Skill: Thunderbolt

Skill used by the capital's ancient dragon cult.
Raise armament aloft to call down a bolt of lightning.
Can be fired in rapid succession.
chn:
战技：落雷

王城古龙信仰的战技之一。
武器指向天之后会蕴藏雷电，召唤落雷。
可以连续施放。

eng:
Skill: Lightning Slash

Call down a bolt of lightning into armament, then swing it down to create an explosive shock.
The armament retains the lightning enchantment for a while.
chn:
战技：雷击斩

让雷电打在武器上，再向下挥舞，
形成强力雷击的战技。
缠绕武器上的雷电会暂时延续。

eng:
Skill: Carian Grandeur

Carian royal prestige embodied in a skill.
Transform blade into a magical greatsword and swing it down.
Can be charged to increase its power by up to two levels.
chn:
战技：伟哉卡利亚

喻为卡利亚王室象征的战技。
将剑身化为魔力大剑，再向下挥舞。
借由蓄力发动，能提升两个阶段。

eng:
Skill: Carian Greatsword

Carian royal prestige embodied in a skill.
Transform blade into a magical greatsword and swing it down.
Can be charged to increase its power.
chn:
战技：卡利亚大剑

喻为卡利亚王室象征的战技。
将剑身化为魔力大剑，再向下挥舞。
借由蓄力发动，能提升威力。

eng:
Skill: Vacuum Slice

Lost skill of ancient heroes.
Hold the armament aloft to surround it with a shearing vacuum, then launch it forwards as a blade-like projectile.
chn:
战技：真空斩

古英雄们的失传战技。
高举剑身形成真空状态，
再化为真空刃，朝前方释放。

eng:
Skill: Black Flame Tornado

Spin armament overhead and then plunge it into the ground to summon a raging vortex of black flames.
Hold to create an initial flame tornado while spinning the armament.
chn:
战技：黑焰漩涡

旋转武器再刺向地面，
唤出漩涡状黑焰的战技。
持续发动的期间，
在旋转时也能形成黑焰漩涡。

eng:
Skill: Sacred Ring of Light

Skill used by the commanders of the Cleanrot Knights. Gather a sacred ring of light in the armament, then fire it forwards.
Can be fired in rapid succession.
chn:
战技：神圣光环

尊腐骑士的指挥官使用的战技。
让武器形成神圣光环，朝前方释放。
可以连续施放。

eng:
Skill: Firebreather

Blow into torch flame, spreading flames in a wide frontward arc. The flames on the ground will continue to burn for a short time.
chn:
战技：喷火

吐出大口气吹向火把的火焰，
让火焰向前大范围燃烧的战技。
火焰会暂时在地面燃烧。

eng:
Skill: Blood Blade

Wound self to coat the armament with blood, then unleash an airborne blood blade that causes hemorrhaging.
Can be fired in rapid succession.
chn:
战技：血刃

自伤后用血液沾染武器，
释放能引发出血的血刃的战技。
可以连续施放。

eng:
Skill: Phantom Slash

Skill inspired by the fond remembrances of the Night's Cavalry. Creates an apparition of the knights' former instructor who guides a joint lunging upward swing. Additional input allows for a follow-up attack.
chn:
战技：幻影共击

黑夜骑兵的恋旧战技。
能形成过去老师的幻影，一同突击上砍。
再次发动能使出追击。

eng:
Skill: Spectral Lance

Skill of the headless Mausoleum Knights.
Hurl a phantasmic spear at foes.
chn:
战技：幻影枪

无头灵庙骑士使用的战技。
能形成幻影枪，投掷攻击。

eng:
Skill: Chilling Mist

Coat armament in frost, and then slash, spreading frigid mist forwards.
The armament retains its frost for a while.
chn:
战技：寒气冻雾

让武器缠绕寒气后使出斩击，
并在前方形成冻雾的战技。
缠绕武器上的寒气会暂时延续。

eng:
Skill: Poisonous Mist

Bathe armament in poison, and then slash, spreading toxic mist forwards.
The armament retains its poison for a while.
chn:
战技：毒雾

让武器缠绕毒之后使出斩击，
并在前方形成毒雾的战技，
缠绕武器上的毒会暂时延续。

eng:
Skill: Shield Bash

Brace behind shield before using bodyweight to ram foes while maintaining guarding stance.
Weaker enemies will be shoved backwards, and can even be staggered.
chn:
战技：盾牌冲击

架稳盾牌、防御的同时，
利用全身的重量向前冲撞的战技。
对弱小的敌人使出，能让对方失去平衡。

eng:
Skill: Barricade Shield

Skill made famous by Sir Neidhardt.
Focus your energy into the shield, temporarily hardening it to deflect greater blows.
chn:
战技：铁壁盾防

因骑士奈德哈特而闻名的战技。
将力量集中至盾牌，暂时强化盾牌的坚硬度，
能抵御更为强大的攻击。

eng:
Skill: Parry

Use this skill in time with a foe's melee attack to deflect it and break that foe's stance.
This provides an opening to perform a critical hit.
chn:
战技：格挡

拨开攻击的同时，让敌人失去平衡的战技。
需要在敌人近距离攻击时配合使用。
失去平衡后，使出“致命一击”的机会随之到来。

eng:
Skill: Buckler Parry

Use this skill in time with a foe's melee attack to deflect it and break that foe's stance.
This is faster than a regular parry.
chn:
战技：小圆盾格挡

拨开攻击的同时，让敌人失去平衡的战技。
需要在敌人近距离攻击时配合使用。
发动速度比战技“格挡”还快。

eng:
Skill: Parry

Use this skill in time with a foe's melee attack to deflect it and break that foe's stance.
This provides an opening to perform a critical hit.
chn:
战技：格挡

拨开攻击的同时，让敌人失去平衡的战技。
需要在敌人近距离攻击时配合使用。
失去平衡后，使出“致命一击”的机会随之到来。

eng:
Skill: Carian Retaliation

Swing the shield to dispel incoming sorceries and incantations, transforming the magic into retaliatory glintblades.
Can also be used in the same way as a regular parry.
chn:
战技：卡利亚式奉还

挥动盾牌消除魔法、祷告的效用，
再用承受的力量化为浮空辉剑的战技。
也能发挥与战技“格挡”相同的功能。

eng:
Skill: Storm Wall

Swing the shield to create a wall of storm winds in front of you, deflecting arrows and other such physical projectiles.
Can also be used in the same way as a regular parry.
chn:
战技：风暴障壁

挥动盾牌，在自身前方形成风暴障壁，
让箭之类的远攻道具偏移的战技。
也能发挥与战技“格挡”相同的功能。

eng:
Skill: Golden Parry

Perform an Erdtree incantation and swing the shield to deflect enemy attacks and break their stance.
Effective even at a slight distance.
chn:
战技：黄金格挡

执行黄金树祷告的同时挥动盾牌，
让敌人的攻击偏移，并失去平衡的战技。
与敌人有些距离也能产生效用。

eng:
Skill: Shield Crash

Two-hand the shield and charge forwards while maintaining guard. Weaker enemies will be shoved backwards and can even be staggered.
Hold to extend the duration of the charge forwards.
chn:
战技：突进冲击

用双手共持盾牌，
防御的同时，向前突进的战技。
对弱小的敌人使出，能让对方失去平衡。
持续发动能增加移动距离。

eng:
Skill: Thops's Barrier

Erect a magical forcefield while swinging the shield to deflect sorceries and incantations.
Can also be used in the same way as a regular parry.
chn:
战技：托普斯的力场

张开魔力力场的同时挥动盾牌，
能拨开魔法、祷告的战技。
也能发挥与战技“格挡”相同的功能。

eng:
Skill: Through and Through

Powerful archery skill using a greatbow held in an oblique stance.
Ready the greatbow, then twist the bowstring to fire a mighty greatarrow that can penetrate through enemies.
chn:
战技：贯穿射击

能侧身拉开大弓，强大的射手战技。
拉开大弓的同时也扭转弓弦，
增加大箭的旋转度，借此贯穿敌人的身体。

eng:
Skill: Barrage

Archery skill using a bow held horizontally.
Ready the bow, then fire off a rapid succession of shots faster than the eye can see.
chn:
战技：连续射击

能水平拉弓的射手战技。
摆出架式后，能以肉眼难以追上的速度，
连续射出箭。

eng:
Skill: Mighty Shot

Archery skill performed from an oblique stance.
Ready the bow, then pull the bowstring to its limit to enhance the power of the shot, penetrating the enemy's guard.
chn:
战技：拉满弓

能侧身拉弓的射手战技。
摆出架式后，用力拉满弓，
能提升箭的攻击威力，突破敌人防御。

eng:
Skill: Enchanted Shot

Archery skill that enlivens the arrow with spiritual essence.
The resulting shot will fly faster than regular shots and change its trajectory to follow the target.
chn:
战技：宿灵射击

摆出架式，让灵魂寄宿在箭之上，
再射击的战技。飞行速度比一般的箭更快。
仿佛会追踪目标，飞行轨道会随之调整。

eng:
Skill: Sky Shot

Archery skill performed from a low stance.
Ready the bow, then fire an arrow high up into the air, arcing so as to strike the enemy from above when it comes down.
chn:
战技：对空射击

压低身形拉弓的射手战技。
摆出架式后，朝天空射出箭，
箭会从敌人上方落下。

eng:
Skill: Rain of Arrows

Archery skill performed from a low stance.
Ready the bow, then fire a burst of arrows into the sky to shower the enemy with projectiles.
chn:
战技：箭雨

压低身形拉弓的战技。
摆出架式后，朝天空一口气射出多支箭，
箭会如雨一般，从敌人上方倾注而下。

eng:
Skill: Invisible Arrow

Nearly invisible magic arrow that leaves
no trail and disappears on impact.
chn: 无形箭

eng:
Skill: Hoarfrost Stomp

Stomp hard to spread a trail of freezing mist on the ground.
The mist applies the frost status effect.
chn:
战技：冻霜踏地

大力踏向地面，让冻霜随之扩散的战技。
冻霜会引发异常状态冻伤。

eng:
Skill: Storm Stomp

One of the skills that channel the tempests of Stormveil.
Stomp hard on the ground to kick up a momentary storm.
chn:
战技：风暴足

史东薇尔的风暴战技之一。
能大力踏向地面，在自身周围引发瞬间的风暴。

eng:
Skill: Kick

Push an enemy back with a high kick.
Effective against enemies who are guarding, and can break a foe's stance.
Sometimes a simple tool is the most effective.
chn:
战技：踢击

大幅抬起脚向前踢的战技。
对正在防御的敌人很有效，能使对方失去平衡。
朴实却又实用的战技。

eng:
Skill: Lightning Ram

Skill inspired by tumbling rams.
Let out a bleat, then tumble forwards, clad in lightning.
Tumbles can be repeated in rapid succession.
chn:
战技：雷电羊球

仿效向前滚的羊而出现的战技。
发出叫声后，能缠绕雷电向前滚动，
可以连续滚动。

eng:
Skill: Flame of the Redmanes

Skill of the Redmanes, who fought alongside General Radahn.
Produce a powerful burst of flames in a wide frontward arc.
chn:
战技：红狮子火焰

与拉塔恩将军并肩作战的
红狮子军队所使用的战技。
能朝前方释放大范围的强烈火焰。

eng:
Skill: Ground Slam

Jump up high into the air and crash down on the ground ahead.
The resulting pratfall sends a powerful shockwave in all directions.
chn:
战技：坠落震击

轻盈向前跳，再顺势用臀部
用力向下坠落的战技。
此攻击能引发剧烈的冲击波。

eng:
Skill: Golden Slam

Skill of the avatars who protect Minor Erdtrees.
Jump up high into the air and crash down on the ground ahead.
The resulting pratfall sends golden shockwaves in all directions.
chn:
战技：黄金坠落震击

守护小黄金树的化身使用的战技。
能轻盈向前跳，用臀部用力向下坠落，
此攻击能引发黄金冲击波。

eng:
Skill: Waves of Darkness

Plunge armament into the ground to release three waves of darkness.
Follow up with a strong attack to swing the armament in a sweeping strike.
chn:
战技：黑暗波动

将武器刺入地面后，在自身周围
产生三道黑暗波动的战技。
发动后接着使出重攻击，能回旋横扫攻击。

eng:
Skill: Hoarah Loux's Earthshaker

Slam both hands onto the ground to violently shake the earth and unleash a shockwave.
Follow up with an additional input to slam the ground again.
chn:
战技：荷莱·露的撼地

以张开的双臂敲向地面，
产生冲击波，引发剧烈摇晃的战技。
再次发动能再一次敲击地面。

eng:
Skill: Determination

A knightly skill.
Hold the flat of the armament to your face and pledge your resolve, powering up your next attack.
chn:
战技：决心

骑士们的战技。
将武器移向眼前、指向天空，坚定决心，
提升下一记攻击的威力。

eng:
Skill: Royal Knight's Resolve

Skill of the knights who once served the Elden Lord.
Hold the flat of the armament to your face and pledge your resolve, greatly powering up your next attack.
chn:
战技：侍王骑士的决心

过去侍奉艾尔登之王的骑士们使用的战技。
将武器移向眼前、指向天空，坚定决心，
大幅提升下一记攻击的威力。

eng:
Skill: Assassin's Gambit

Skill that masks the user's presence at the cost of a self-inflicted wound.
Grants near-invisibility and silences footsteps.
chn:
战技：暗杀办法

自伤之后，消除自身存在的战技。
能让施放者的身影难以辨认，
也能消除施放者的脚步声。

eng:
Skill: Golden Vow

Skill passed down from antiquity among the knights of the capital. Raise armament aloft and pledge to honor the Erdtree in battle, granting self and nearby allies increased attack power and defense.
chn:
战技：黄金树立誓

王城骑士们自古继承而来的战技。
将武器指向天空，发誓为黄金树而战，
提升自己与周围我方人物的攻击力与防御力。

eng:
Skill: Sacred Order

Skill of the Golden Order fundamentalist knights.
Perform a salute and grant the armament holy essence.
Highly effective against Those Who Live in Death.
chn:
战技：圣律

黄金律法基本主义者的骑士们使用的战技。
敬礼的同时，能替武器附加神圣性。
对死诞者的伤害尤为巨大。

eng:
Skill: Shared Order

Skill of the Golden Order fundamentalist knights.
Grant the armament and those of nearby allies holy essence.
Highly effective against Those Who Live in Death.
chn:
战技：共享圣律

黄金律法基本主义者的骑士们使用的战技。
能替自身与周围我方人物的武器附加神圣性。
对死诞者的伤害尤为巨大。

eng:
Skill: Seppuku

A forbidden technique used by swordsmen from the Land of Reeds. Plunge the blade into your stomach to stain it with blood. Increases attack power and improves ability to inflict blood loss.
chn:
战技：切腹

芦苇之地的剑客，禁用的奥义。
将武器深深刺入自己的腹部，染上鲜血，
能提升攻击力、强化异常状态出血的效果。

eng:
Skill: Cragblade

Skill that manipulates gravity.
Bury the armament in the ground, pulling rocks from the earth to reinforce it. Increases attack power and makes it easier to break enemy stance.
chn:
战技：岩石剑

以重力招式为人知晓的战技。
将武器敲向地面，让岩石攀附其上。
能提升攻击力，也容易让敌人失去平衡。

eng:
Skill: Barbaric Roar

Let loose a bestial roar to rally the spirit and increase attack power.
While active, strong attacks change to savage combo attacks.
chn:
战技：野蛮咆哮

发出野兽般的咆哮，
借此激励自己，提升攻击力的战技。
在战技有效期间内，重攻击会变成野蛮连击。

eng:
Skill: War Cry

Give a war cry to rally the spirit and increase attack power.
While active, strong attacks change to charging attacks.
chn:
战技：战吼

透过咆哮激励自己，提升攻击力的战技。
在战技有效期间内，重攻击会变成突进攻击。

eng:
Skill: Beast's Roar

Unleash a beastly roar, rending the air as a forward-travelling projectile.
chn:
战技：野兽咆哮

发出野兽般的咆哮，划破空气，
将咆哮声化成球体释放的战技。

eng:
Skill: Troll's Roar

Look into the distance and let out an intense roar, generating a powerful shockwave that blows back surrounding foes.
Follow up with a strong attack to slam the armament down.
chn:
战技：山妖咆哮

望向远方发出咆哮，
能弹飞周围人物，产生冲击波。
发动后接着使出重攻击，能激烈敲击。

eng:
Skill: Braggart's Roar

Declare your presence with a boastful roar.
Raises attack power, defense, and stamina recovery speed.
chn:
战技：夸耀咆哮

犹如夸耀自我般发出咆哮，
能提升攻击力、防御力、精力恢复速度的战技。

eng:
Skill: Endure

Assume an anchored stance to brace for incoming attacks, briefly boosting poise.
Damage taken while using this skill is reduced.
chn:
战技：忍耐

心中做好准备放低重心，站稳步伐，
能瞬间提升强韧度的战技。
在战技有效期间内，能减轻受到的损伤。

eng:
Skill: Vow of the Indomitable

Skill of the ancient warriors of the Erdtree.
Hold shield aloft to imbue yourself with golden power, granting momentary invincibility.
chn:
战技：无敌

黄金树的古老战士们使用的战技。
高举盾牌，让黄金力量充满全身，
能够瞬间呈现无敌状态。

eng:
Skill: Holy Ground

Raise shield to create an Erdtree-consecrated area that continuously restores HP and boosts defense for self and allies inside it.
chn:
战技：圣域

高举盾牌，展开黄金树圣域的战技。
能持续恢复血量，提升防御力，
圣域内的我方人物也能蒙受相同效果。

eng:
Skill: Quickstep

Skill prized by the crafty and fleet of foot.
Perform a quickstep maneuver that allows for circling around lock-on targets.
chn:
战技：碎步

以速度干扰敌人的战斗者们使用的战技。
能以轻盈步伐快速移动。
在锁定目标的状态下使用，能以目标为中心移动。

eng:
Skill: Bloodhound's Step

Skill that allows the user to become temporarily invisible while dodging at high speed. Moves faster and travels farther than a regular quickstep.
This skill can be used to circle around lock-on targets.
chn:
战技：猎犬步法

能瞬间消失身影，以踏步移动的战技。
移动速度快，距离也长。
在锁定目标的状态下使用，能以目标为中心移动。

eng:
Skill: Raptor of the Mists

Duck into a low stance, momentarily vanishing.
If an enemy attack connects, avian wings will allow for a quick escape into the air.
chn:
战技：潜雾猛禽

压低身形，瞬间消失身影的战技。
受到攻击时能长出猛禽翅膀，
瞬间一跃而起。

eng:
Skill: White Shadow's Lure

Hold armament in a brief, silent prayer to create a white shadow.
The apparition lures in foes of human build who are not in combat, drawing their aggression. Effective on demi-humans even if they are already in a combat state.
chn:
战技：白影诱惑

对着武器发愿，在自身前方形成白色影子。
能吸引非战斗状态，为人类之身的敌人注意，
引诱对方攻击的战技。但对上亚人时，
即使对方在战斗状态，也具有诱敌效用。

eng:
Unique Skill: Surge of Faith

Set the flames of Birac's faith ablaze in the cranial vessel, then raise it aloft to rain down fireballs in all directions.
Repeated inputs will continue to raise the armament aloft, continuing the attack.
chn:
专用战技：信仰喷发

在尊容火杯里，燃烧彼拉克的信仰火焰，
再将火杯向上突刺，喷发大量火焰的战技。
再次发动能多次向上突刺。

eng:
Unique Skill: Flame Spit

Ready the shield, then launch a fireball from the barrel.
The fireball explodes on impact.
chn:
专用战技：火焰唾球

举起盾牌，从炮管发射火焰球的战技。
火焰球会在命中后爆炸。

eng:
Unique Skill: Tongues of Fire

Ready the shield, then spray violent jets of fire from the tongues protruding from its maw.
Hold to continue spraying fire. This skill can be used while walking.
chn:
专用战技：火焰舌柱

举起盾牌，从舌尖喷出猛烈火焰的战技。
持续发动的期间能持续喷出火焰，
也能在发动战技时走动。

eng:
Unique Skill: Oracular Bubble

Blow on the horn to release a magic bubble.
The bubble floats gently through the air towards its target.
chn:
专用战技：神谕泡泡

吹奏笛子，释放魔力泡泡的战技。
泡泡会缓缓飘动，并朝目标飞去。

eng:
Unique Skill: Bubble Shower

Blow on the horn to release a spume of magic bubbles.
The bubbles float gently before raining down on the target.
chn:
专用战技：倾注泡泡

吹奏笛子，释放大量魔力泡泡的战技。
泡泡会缓缓飘动，并朝目标倾注而下。

eng:
Unique Skill: Great Oracular Bubble

Blow on the horn to release a massive magic bubble.
The bubble floats gently through the air towards its target.
chn:
专用战技：神谕大泡泡

吹奏笛子，释放魔力大泡泡的战技。
大泡泡会缓缓飘动，并朝目标飞去。

eng:
Unique Skill: Sea of Magma

Swing a molten whip overhead to temporarily cover the surrounding area in a sea of magma.
Hold to continue swinging the lava whip.
chn:
专用战技：熔岩海

能大幅挥动熔岩鞭子，
暂时在自身周围形成熔岩海的战技。
持续发动的时间，能持续挥舞熔岩鞭子。

eng:
Unique Skill: Viper Bite

Give the shield a quick shake to temporarily bring the bronze viper to life, inciting it to lash out and bite foes.
chn:
专用战技：毒蛇咬杀

轻轻摇动盾牌，
暂时赋予青铜制毒蛇生命，
让毒蛇伸长身体，咬向敌人的战技。

eng:
Unique Skill: Moonlight Greatsword

Raise the sword aloft, bathing it in the light of the dark moon.
Temporarily increases magic attack power and imbues blade with frost.
Charged attacks release blasts of moonlight.
chn:
专用战技：月光剑

高举剑，让整把剑发出暗月月光的战技。
能暂时提升魔力属性攻击力，
让剑身缠绕冻伤寒气。
蓄力攻击能释放月光波。

eng:
Unique Skill: Siluria's Woe

Thrust the treespear in a spiraling motion, surrounding it in a vortex of wind.
Charged attacks have the power to blow away enemies and can fire the tornado forwards.
chn:
专用战技：志留亚的漩涡

旋转树矛、缠绕风流漩涡，再使出突刺的战技。
借由蓄力发动，会变得具有弹飞敌人的威力，
也能朝前方释放风流漩涡。

eng:
Unique Skill: Rallying Standard

Hoist the war banner aloft and give a rallying command.
Raises attack power and defense for self and nearby allies.
chn:
专用战技：归于麾下

高举军旗，以勇猛姿态发出号令的战技。
能提升自身与周围我方人物的攻击力、防御力。

eng:
Unique Skill: Bear Witness!

Grant the small dragon a fleeting glimpse of life and thrust it skyward, spewing flames over a wide frontward area.
chn:
专用战技：敬请见证！

暂时赋予小型龙生命，高举指向天空，
朝前方大范围落下龙焰的战技。

eng:
Unique Skill: Eochaid's Dancing Blade

Infuse the sword with energy, then fling it forwards in a corkscrew attack. The sword continuously deals damage while violently spinning.
Charge the attack to increase reach and duration of the spin.
chn:
专用战技：欧赫剑舞

把气灌入剑中，旋转之后朝前方释放的战技。
整把剑会剧烈旋转，给予连续损伤。
借由蓄力发动，能提升飞翔距离与旋转时间。

eng:
Unique Skill: Soul Stifler

Raise the greathorn's wings to summon a soul-sapping miasma.
Enemies in the affected area will temporarily suffer from reduced defense.
chn:
专用战技：恶意气息

高举展翼大角，招来恶意气息的战技。
能暂时降低周围敌人的防御力。

eng:
Unique Skill: Taker's Flames

Raise the sacred sword aloft to set it ablaze with blasphemous flames, then bring it down to fire off a forward blast.
The flames steal HP from those they touch.
chn:
专用战技：掠夺火焰

高举圣剑，燃起亵渎火焰，
再朝前方释放烈火的战技。
火焰会夺取血量。

eng:
Unique Skill: Shriek of Milos

Lets out a horrific cursed scream that reduces all damage negation and status resistances for nearby foes.
While active, strong attacks will change to a combo attack.
chn:
专用战技：灭洛斯的狂嚎

发出带有诅咒的恐怖狂嚎，
让周围的敌人降低所有属性的减伤率、
所有异常状态的抵抗力。
在战技有效期间内，重攻击会变成连击。

eng:
Unique Skill: Reduvia Blood Blade

Slash with the wicked dagger, transforming its never-drying bloodstains into airborne blood blades that cause hemorrhaging.
Can be fired in rapid succession.
chn:
专用战技：逆刺血刃

将锯齿状剑刃上的湿漉鲜血，
化为引发出血的刀刃，释放而出的战技。
可以连续施放。

eng:
Unique Skill: Glintstone Dart

Skill that builds from the Glintstone Pebble sorcery.
Charge the skill to upgrade it to Glintstone Dart.
Follow up with a strong attack to chain this skill into a lunging thrust.
chn:
专用战技：辉石彗砾

能施展魔法“辉石魔砾”的战技。
借由蓄力发动，能变成“辉石彗砾”。
发动后接着使出重攻击，
能大幅向前跨出，再突刺攻击，

eng:
Unique Skill: Flowing Form

Temporarily transforms armament into its liquid form.
Swing the armament like a whip to perform a sweeping slice over a wide area.
chn:
专用战技：流体化

让武器暂时化为流体的战技。
能像软鞭般挥动，大范围横扫敌人。

eng:
Unique Skill: Night-and-Flame Stance

Hold the sword level and prepare to cast a sorcery.
Follow up with a normal attack to cast the Night Comet sorcery, or a strong attack to sweep forward with a burst of flames.
chn:
专用战技：夜与火的架式

举起剑与地面平行，接着施展魔法的战技。
轻攻击能将魔力化为“黑夜彗星”释放；
重攻击能用火焰大范围横扫前方。

eng:
Unique Skill: Wave of Gold

Imbue the sword with bygone golden glory, then fire it at foes.
A wide, golden wave fans out forwards, sweeping through all enemies caught in its path.
chn:
专用战技：黄金波动

将剑身寄宿旧时的黄金，接着释放的战技。
黄金波动会朝前方扇状大幅扩散，
横扫所有敌人。

eng:
Unique Skill: Ruinous Ghostflame

Swing the sword to bathe its blade in ghostflame.
The ghostflame adds magic damage to attacks, and also has a bitterly cold bite.
chn:
专用战技：毁灭灵火

挥动剑，让剑身缠绕灵火的战技。
灵火能给予魔力属性伤害。
此外，灵火非常地冰冷。

eng:
Unique Skill: Establish Order

Raise the armament in a salute, releasing a golden explosion.
Repeated inputs send out waves of golden light.
chn:
专用战技：高举黄金律法

敬礼的同时高举武器，
形成黄金爆炸的战技。
再次发动，能释放黄金光波。

eng:
Unique Skill: Mists of Slumber

Releases a faint purple mist that spreads across a wide frontwards area.
This mist inflicts the sleep ailment upon foes.
chn:
专用战技：催眠烟雾

朝前方形成大范围淡紫色烟雾的战技。
淡紫色烟雾具有引发异常状态催眠的效果。

eng:
Unique Skill: Spearcall Ritual

Thrust the spear high, bearing prayers into the sky to summon a downpour of spectral spears.
chn:
专用战技：唤矛仪式

祈祷的同时高举矛，指向天空，
召唤倾注而下的无数灵矛的战技。

eng:
Unique Skill: Wolf's Assault

Infuse the greatsword with frost, then perform a forward somersault to plunge it into the ground. Then, pull it out to release a cold blast.
chn:
专用战技：狼袭

剑身缠绕寒气，一边旋身一边向前跳，
再顺势将大剑刺入地面的战技。
拔起大剑的同时，会引发寒气爆炸。

eng:
Unique Skill: Thundercloud Form

Temporarily transform into a red thundercloud and fly through the air, then plunge down with a lightning-infused blade.
Hold to increase the reach of the thundercloud form.
chn:
专用战技：雷云化身

自己暂时化为红色雷云，飞上空中，
再用缠绕雷电的剑身贯穿敌人的战技。
持续发动能增加在空中移动的距离。

eng:
Unique Skill: Cursed-Blood Slice

Brace, then charge forward to deliver a downward diagonal slice.
The bloody trail of the blade is followed by a burst of flame.
Additional input allows for a follow-up attack.
chn:
专用战技：咒血斩击

摆出架式后一口气向前冲，使出下砍的战技。
下砍后的鲜血剑光会伴随较晚引发的火焰爆炸。
再次发动能使出追击。

eng:
Unique Skill: Waterfowl Dance

Perform a series of one-footed leaps in the manner of a waterfowl to unleash a swift yet graceful slashing combo.
Repeated inputs allow for up to two follow-up attacks.
chn:
专用战技：水鸟乱舞

犹如水鸟般单脚跳跃，
再使出超高速连斩的战技。
再次发动，能使出最多两次的追击。

eng:
Unique Skill: Gold Breaker

Leap up high and, while suspended in midair, imbue the rune shard with light before smashing it down hard onto the ground.
The heroic Radagon's signature attack.
chn:
专用战技：黄金碎击

轻盈跳起，让卢恩碎片蕴藏光芒，
再从空中用力敲下的战技。
拉达冈英雄般的敲击。

eng:
Unique Skill: I Command Thee, Kneel!

Repeatedly smash the Axe of Godrick into the ground, unleashing two earth-shaking shockwaves.
Follow up with an additional input to produce a third shockwave.
chn:
专用战技：跪下吧！

将王斧连续刺向地面，产生冲击波之余，
也撼动地面两次的战技。
再次发动，能再一次剧烈撼动地面。

eng:
Unique Skill: Regal Roar

Let loose a mighty war cry, raising attack power, while sending out a shockwave that cannot be guarded against by stomping the ground. While active, strong attack becomes a lunging slash.
chn:
专用战技：王者嘶吼

发出嘶吼，提升攻击力的战技。
踏地时的冲击波无法用防御挡下。
在战技有效时间内，
重攻击会变成前踏斩击。

eng:
Unique Skill: Starcaller Cry

Bring the two swords together and roar into the skies, pulling in enemies with a gravitational wave.
Follow up with an additional input to slam down with gravity-infused swords.
chn:
专用战技：唤星

双剑交错、指向天空的同时发出嘶吼，
利用重力波拉近敌人的战技。
再次发动，能用缠绕重力的剑使出敲击。

eng:
Unique Skill: Wave of Destruction

Raise the sword up high, then strike it against the ground to fire off a wave of gravitational force.
chn:
专用战技：崩坏波

高举剑之后向下敲，
释放于地面爬行的重力波的战技。

eng:
Unique Skill: Bloodboon Ritual

Raise the sacred spear and pierce the body of the Formless Mother. Stab up to three times, creating explosions of blood with each thrust.
This skill will coat the armament with bloodflame for a while.
chn:
专用战技：授血仪式

高举圣矛，刺进无形之母体内的战技。
最多能刺三次，每次都会引发鲜血爆炸。
缠绕圣矛上的血焰会暂时延续。

eng:
Unique Skill: Flowing Form

Temporarily transforms armament into its liquid form. Swing the armament like a whip to strike surroundings before slamming its teardrop-shaped head down.
chn:
专用战技：流体化

让武器暂时化为流体的战技。
能大幅挥动，大范围横扫敌人，
再用泪滴状的打击部位向下敲。

eng:
Unique Skill: Blade of Death

Unleash the power of the Rune of Death to fire off a blade-like projectile.
In addition to dealing immediate damage, the blade reduces the enemy's maximum HP and continues to wear down HP for a while.
chn:
专用战技：死亡刀刃

解放死亡卢恩的力量，
将力量化为刀刃后释放的战技。
给予敌人伤害的同时，也会减少血量上限，
并且在一定时间内，血量会持续减少。

eng:
Unique Skill: Blade of Gold

Leap into the air, charging the armament with golden flames that are then shot at the enemy as a single, blade-like projectile.
Inflicts holy damage.
chn:
专用战技：黄金刀刃

跳至空中，让武器缠绕黄金火焰，
将火焰化为刀刃后释放的战技。
能给予圣属性伤害。

eng:
Unique Skill: Destined Death

Set free the remnants of Destined Death, plunging the greatsword into the ground to summon a myriad of blades. In addition to dealing immediate damage, this attack reduces the enemy's maximum HP and continues to wear down HP for a short time.
chn:
专用战技：命定之死

解放命定之死残留的碎屑，
将大剑刺向地面，形成无数刀刃的战技。
给予敌人伤害的同时，也会减少血量上限，
并且在短暂时间内，血量会些微持续减少。

eng:
Unique Skill: Spinning Wheel

Strike the wheel against the ground to set it spinning at top speed. Hold to keep the wheel spinning. Can be used while walking to push the armament into enemies.
chn:
专用战技：旋转刺轮

摩擦地面，让刺轮高速旋转的战技。
持续发动能让刺轮维持高速旋转，
也能直接移动，将刺轮推向敌人。

eng:
Unique Skill: Alabaster Lord's Pull

Thrust the armament into the ground to create a gravity well. In addition to dealing damage, this attack pulls enemies in.
Has a greater area of effect than Gravitas.
chn:
专用战技：白王引力波

将武器刺入地面，产生重力波，
能给予敌人伤害，同时将对方拉近自己的战技。
与战技“重力”相比，有效范围更广。

eng:
Unique Skill: Onyx Lord's Repulsion

Thrust the armament into the ground to create a gravity well. In addition to dealing damage, this attack sends enemies flying away.
chn:
专用战技：黑王推力波

将武器刺入地面，产生重力波，
能给予敌人伤害，同时将对方弹飞的战技。

eng:
Unique Skill: Oath of Vengeance

Swear an oath upon the greatsword to avenge the clan, temporarily raising all attributes for a certain duration. While the oath's effects are active, poise will also be increased.
chn:
专用战技：复仇誓言

对大剑立下为一族复仇的誓言，
一定时间内，提升所有能力值的战技。
在立誓的那一瞬间，也会提升强韧度。

eng:
Unique Skill: Ice Lightning Sword

Call down a bolt of ice lightning into the blade and bring it down upon a foe.
The ice lightning effect will persist for a while.
chn:
专用战技：冰雷剑

高举刀身召唤冰雷，再一斩而下的战技。
缠绕刀身上的冰雷会暂时延续。

eng:
Unique Skill: Regal Beastclaw

Slam the hammer into the ground, rending the land asunder with the armament's five bestial claws.
chn:
专用战技：兽王爪

将大锤敲向地面，
让五只兽爪大幅撕裂大地的战技。

eng:
Unique Skill: Flame Dance

Imbue the red braid with the Giants' Flame and lash out in a wide range with a series of agile swings.
chn:
专用战技：火焰舞

在红发鞭点燃巨人火焰，流水一般地
使出连续大范围横扫攻击的战技。

eng:
Unique Skill: Claw Flick

Cause the finger to swell, then flex to build up strength before giving enemies an almighty flick.
chn:
专用战技：弹指

让手指膨胀变大，弯曲蓄满力量，
再用指尖弹飞敌人的战技。

eng:
Unique Skill: Nebula

Imbue the Naturalborn's stars with magic to perform a sweeping strike.
This attack leaves a dark cloud of stars in its wake that lingers briefly before exploding.
chn:
专用战技：星云

对弃子的星星们灌入魔力，
使出横扫攻击的同时，形成黑暗星云的战技。
星云会在短时间内爆炸消失。

eng:
Unique Skill: Ghostflame Ignition

Thrust out the barbed rod and set its tip alight with ghostflame.
Follow up with a normal attack to set the ground ablaze with ghostflame, or a strong attack to trigger a massive explosion.
chn:
专用战技：点燃灵火

从钩状前端产生灵火的战技。
发动后接着使出轻攻击，能释放爬行地面的灵火。
使出重攻击能引爆灵火，形成大爆炸。

eng:
Unique Skill: Ancient Lightning Spear

Imbue the armament with the ancient dragons' red lightning, then throw it as a spear.
Can be charged to increase its power.
chn:
专用战技：古雷电枪

将古龙的武器──红色雷电缠绕在武器上，
再将雷电化成枪，投掷而出的战技。
借由蓄力发动，能提升威力。

eng:
Unique Skill: Frenzyflame Thrust

Imbue the spear with the flame of frenzy and leap forwards, plunging it into the ground and setting off a maddening explosion.
The skill inflicts both the enemy and the user with madness.
chn:
专用战技：癫火突击

将癫火缠绕矛之后向前跳，
向下刺出的同时，引发剧烈爆炸的战技。
施放者也会累积发狂量表。

eng:
Unique Skill: Miquella's Ring of Light

Summon Miquella's shining halo and fire it forwards.
Can be fired in rapid succession.
chn:
专用战技：米凯拉的光环

形成米凯拉的闪耀光环，再向前释放的战技。
可以连续施放。

eng:
Unique Skill: Golden Tempering

Cross the two swords to grant their attacks holy essence.
While in effect, strong attack performs a dual-wielding combo attack.
chn:
专用战技：黄金剑技

将两把剑交叉，附加圣属性攻击力的战技。
在战技有效时间内，
重攻击会变成双剑连击。

eng:
Unique Skill: Last Rites

Raise the epitaph to grant the effect of Sacred Order to yourself and allies in the vicinity.
Particularly effective at laying to rest Those Who Live in Death.
chn:
专用战技：哀悼墓碑

高举墓碑，包含周围我方人物
附加圣律力量的战技。
对死诞者的哀悼效果特别卓越。

eng:
Unique Skill: Unblockable Blade

Imbue the cipher blade with light, extending its length, then strike with a sudden sweeping attack.
This attack cannot be blocked.
chn:
专用战技：不可挡之刃

让秘文剑刃蕴藏光芒，
增加剑身长度，使出大范围斩击的战技。
此攻击无法用防御挡下。

eng:
Unique Skill: Eochaid's Dancing Blade

Infuse the sword with energy, then fling it forwards in a corkscrew attack. The sword continuously deals damage while violently spinning.
Charge the attack to increase reach and duration of the spin.
chn:
专用战技：欧赫剑舞

把气灌入剑中，旋转之后朝前方释放的战技。
整把剑会剧烈旋转，给予连续损伤。
借由蓄力发动，能提升飞翔距离与旋转时间。

eng:
Unique Skill: Corpse Wax Cutter

Lost skill of ancient heroes.
Lift the sword up high to release the power of corpse wax and launch it forwards as a blade-like projectile.
chn:
专用战技：尸蜡斩击

古英雄们的失传战技。
高举剑身，解放尸蜡的力量，
将力量化为刀刃，朝前方释放。

eng:
Unique Skill: Zamor Ice Storm

Plunge the curved sword into the ground, building power before unleashing a freezing storm that batters the surroundings.
chn:
专用战技：萨米尔冰风暴

将弯刀刺入地面，向下使力，
在周围形成寒气风暴的战技。

eng:
Unique Skill: Radahn's Rain

Archery skill performed from a low stance.
Ready the bow and fire a sudden flurry of arrows up into the sky. The arrows will pour on foes like rain.
chn:
专用战技：拉塔恩的骤雨

压低身形拉弓的战技。
摆出架式后，朝天空一口气射出大量的箭，
箭会如骤雨一般，从敌人上方倾注而下。

eng:
Unique Skill: The Queen's Black Flame

Set the blade ablaze with the god-slaying black flame before delivering a sweeping slash. Additional input allows for a follow-up attack. The black flames will continue to wear down HP for a while.
chn:
专用战技：女王黑焰

在剑身点燃狩猎神祇的黑焰，
使出斩击的战技。再次发动能使出追击。
黑焰会在一定时间内，让血量持续减少。

eng:
Unique Skill: Dynast's Finesse

Nimbly avoid an attack, securing some distance from foes. Follow up with strong attack to perform a sudden lunge, and press strong attack again to perform a sweeping slice.
chn:
专用战技：王朝剑技

优雅地闪避攻击，与敌人拉开距离的战技。
发动后接着使出重攻击，
能一口气向前推进，突刺攻击。
再次使出重攻击，能横扫攻击。

eng:
Unique Skill: Magma Shower

Slash at foes in a twirling motion while scattering magma all around.
Additional input allows for a follow-up attack.
chn:
专用战技：泼洒熔岩

旋身砍向敌人的同时，
朝周围喷洒熔岩的战技。
再次发动能使出追击。

eng:
Unique Skill: Nebula

Imbue the Naturalborn's wings with magic to send forth a dark cloud of stars that lingers briefly before exploding.
chn:
专用战技：星云

对弃子的薄翼灌入魔力，
在前方形成黑暗星云的战技。
星云会在短时间内爆炸消失。

eng:
Unique Skill: Death Flare

Set the lusterless sun ablaze with the Prince of Death's flames, inflicting the death ailment upon foes.
Follow up with an additional input to bring down the armament, triggering an explosion.
chn:
专用战技：死亡闪焰

让失色的太阳蕴藏死王子火焰的战技。
能够引发异常状态死亡。
再次发动能使出下砍，引爆火焰。

eng:
Unique Skill: Bloodhound's Finesse

Slash upwards with the Bloodhound's Fang, using the momentum of the strike to perform a backwards somersault and gain some distance from foes. Follow up with a strong attack to perform the Bloodhound's Step attack.
chn:
专用战技：猎犬剑技

用长牙大幅上砍的同时，
旋身与敌人拉开距离的战技。
发动后接着使出重攻击，
能踩出“猎犬步法”向前追击。

eng:
Unique Skill: Magma Guillotine

Grab the scalesword with both hands, as a wyrm would hold it in its mouth, and leap forwards, smashing it into the ground and triggering a blast of magma. Follow up with an additional input to perform a chopping attack.
chn:
专用战技：熔岩断首

横摆鳞剑、剑锋下转往前跳，
向下敲击的同时，引爆熔岩的战技。
再次发动能使出拉近追击。

eng:
Unique Skill: Corpse Piler

Forms a blade of cursed blood for repeated, interweaving successive attacks. Follow up with an additional input for further successive attacks.
chn:
战技：尸横遍野

将诅咒之血化为刀刃，
形成交叉连击的战技。
再次发动能使出更多连击。

eng:
Unique Skill: Transient Moonlight

Sheathe blade, holding it at the hip in a composed stance.
Follow up with either a normal or a strong attack to draw the blade at great speed for an instant slash attack. Both attacks fire off a wave of light.
chn:
专用战技：隙间月影

收刀入腰间刀鞘，
摆出架式后静止不动的战技。
发动后接着使出轻攻击或重攻击，
能在高速斩击之余，也释放光波。

eng:
Unique Skill: Bloodblade Dance

Leap at foe to perform a flurry of tornado-like attacks.
Follow up with an additional input to perform an attack that ends in an evasive maneuver.
chn:
专用战技：血刃乱舞

跳起之后，犹如旋风般使出连击的战技。
再次发动能在追击之后，与敌人拉开距离。

eng:
Skill: Death Monarch

Launch summoned death monarchs at enemies,
siphoning HP from those hit and returning
it to the caster.
chn: 死蝶之舞

eng:
Skill: Miquella's Hidden Blade

Conjures a blade blessed with Miquella's protection, and performs an attack that is highly damaging against those who live in death.
chn:
战技：米凯拉的奥秘剑

让米凯拉的庇佑蕴藏剑身之上，
对上死诞者能提升攻击力的战技。

eng:
Unique Skill: Knowledge Above All

Raise the scepter to manifest the realm of the All-Knowing. Enemy magic and holy damage negation will be reduced for all within the area, including the caster.
chn:
专用战技：百智的世界

高举权杖，在周围展开百智领域的战技。
包含自身与领域内的人物
降低魔力、圣属性减伤率。

eng:
Unique Skill: Devourer of Worlds

Charge the scepter with magic and strike it against the ground to steal the HP of all nearby enemies.
chn:
专用战技：吞世

将灌入魔力的权杖伫立地面，
从周围所有敌人身上夺取血量的战技。

eng:
Unique Skill: Familial Rancor

Gently rattle the copper heads to summon vengeful spirits that chase down foes.
The anguish of a spouse and children invites accursed wrath.
chn:
专用战技：家族怨魂

一边轻晃红铜制的头颅，
一边召唤穷追不舍的怨魂群的战技。
妻与子的苦痛是怨魂作祟的源头。

eng:
Unique Skill: Rosus's Summons

Raise the axe aloft to summon those lost in death.
Three skeletons will appear at a distance and attack in tandem before vanishing.
chn:
专用战技：罗泽司的唤声

高举斧，召唤迷途死者们的战技。
三位死者会在远方现身，
配合施放者一起攻击后，消失踪影。

eng:
Unique Skill: Thunderstorm

Imbue the armament's wing-blade with lightning and swing it around to create a tempestuous lightning storm. Follow up with an additional input to perform up to two spinning attacks.
The lightning will stay on the blade for a while.
chn:
专用战技：雷电风暴

让羽翼斧刃缠绕雷电，
在周围形成雷电风暴的战技。
再次发动，能使出最多两次的旋身追击。
缠绕斧刃上的雷电会暂时延续。

eng:
Unique Skill: Sacred Phalanx

Release the power of a hidden incantation to erect a palisade of golden spears frontwards.
chn:
专用战技：圣矛障壁

释放蕴藏的祷告力量，
在前方展开黄金矛阵的战技。

eng:
Unique Skill: Great-Serpent Hunt

Perform a powerful forward lunge and follow up with an upward thrust via additional input. When fighting a great serpent, a long blade of light will appear, revealing the armament's true power.
chn:
专用战技：狩猎大蛇

能全力突刺，再次发动后
会向上突刺攻击的战技。
对上大蛇时会产生长形光刃，
展现出真正的力量。

eng:
Unique Skill: Angel's Wings

Jump and imbue the wing-blade of the armament with light, then deliver a slashing attack on the enemy.
The white wings impede recovery actions using a flask of tears.
chn:
专用战技：天使羽翼

跳起的同时，让羽翼镰刃蕴藏白光，
再顺势斩下的战技。
白色羽翼能妨碍圣杯瓶的恢复效用。

eng:
Unique Skill: Storm Kick

Thrust the prosthetic leg blade into the ground, creating a storm.
Follow up with a strong attack to perform a lightning-infused jumping attack.
chn:
专用战技：风暴踢击

将义足的刀刃刺入地面，形成风暴的战技。
发动后接着使出重攻击，
能让刀刃缠绕雷电，再跳跃攻击。

eng:
Unique Skill: Unblockable Blade

Imbue the cipher blade with light, then lunge forward with a sudden piercing attack.
This attack cannot be blocked.
chn:
专用战技：不可挡之刃

让秘文剑刃蕴藏光芒，
再一口气推进，贯穿敌人的战技。
此攻击无法用防御挡下。

eng:
Unique Skill: Sorcery of the Crozier

Channel magic into the glintstone to activate an ancient sorcery, producing floating magic projectiles that chase enemies automatically.
chn:
专用战技：锡杖魔法

将辉石灌入魔力，触发古老魔法的战技。
周围会出现自动飞向敌人的浮空魔法球。

eng:
Unique Skill: Erdtree Slam

Jump up high into the air and crash down on the ground ahead. The resulting pratfall sends golden shockwaves in all directions.
This is the most powerful of all the Ground Slam skills.
chn:
专用战技：黄金树坠落震击

轻盈向前跳，用臀部用力向下坠落，
引发黄金冲击波的战技。
在坠落震击的战技中，威力最为强大。

eng:
Unique Skill: Gravity Bolt

Imbue the jaw of fallingstar beast with gravitational lightning, sending a bolt crashing down a short distance away.
Can be fired in rapid succession.
chn:
专用战技：重力雷电

让星兽半颚蕴藏重力雷电，
借此在远方召唤落雷的战技。
可以连续施放。

eng:
Unique Skill: Fires of Slumber

Blow into the candlestick's flame, creating a stream of hazy purple fire to cover the ground ahead.
The intoxicating flames inflict the sleep ailment upon foes.
chn:
专用战技：催眠火焰

吐气吹向烛台的火焰，用淡紫色的火焰
朝前方大范围横扫的战技。
具有引发异常状态催眠的效果。

eng:
Unique Skill: Golden Retaliation

Ready the shield to unleash its protective incantation.
This will dispel sorceries and incantations, retaliating with golden power.
chn:
专用战技：黄金式奉还

手持盾牌，释放守护祷告的战技。
能消除魔法、祷告的效用，以黄金力量奉还。

eng:
Unique Skill: Contagious Fury

Incite the jellyfish's wrath and allow its fury to flow through you.
Raises attack power for a certain duration.
chn:
专用战技：共鸣愤怒

诱发水母的愤怒，
让自己也感同身受的战技。
一定时间内，提升攻击力。

eng:
Unique Skill: Ordovis's Vortex

Channel the power of the crucible to spin the entire sword in midair, building momentum before slamming the blade down onto the ground.
This skill can be charged to increase its power.
chn:
专用战技：奥陶琵斯的漩涡

用熔炉的漩涡力量激烈旋转整个剑身，
再顺势敲向地面的战技。
借由蓄力发动，能提升威力。

eng:
Unique Skill: Spinning Weapon

Channel magic into the glintstone to suspend the scepter in mid air and cause it to spin violently.
Those it touches will suffer successive magic attacks.
chn:
专用战技：转啊转

将辉石灌入魔力，让权杖浮在自身前方
再高速旋转的战技。
触碰到的人物会受到魔力连击。
